mapper.sql: id as id, asn_id as asnId, asn_line_id as asnLineId, sku_id as skuId, container_id as containerId, ext_container_code as extContainerCode, quantity as quantity, mfg_date as mfgDate, exp_date as expDate, batch_no as batchNo, country_of_origin as countryOfOrigin, inv_status as invStatus, inv_attr1 as invAttr1, inv_attr2 as invAttr2, inv_attr3 as invAttr3, inv_attr4 as invAttr4, inv_attr5 as invAttr5, inv_type as invType, ou_id as ouId, is_caselevel as isCaselevel, create_time as createTime, created_id as createdId, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, modified_id as modifiedId
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_carton SET asn_id = #{asnId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , asn_line_id = #{asnLineId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , sku_id = #{skuId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , container_id = #{containerId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , ext_container_code = #{extContainerCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , quantity = #{quantity,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , mfg_date = #{mfgDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , exp_date = #{expDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , batch_no = #{batchNo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , country_of_origin = #{countryOfOrigin,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_status = #{invStatus,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , inv_attr1 = #{invAttr1,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr2 = #{invAttr2,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr3 = #{invAttr3,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr4 = #{invAttr4,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr5 = #{invAttr5,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_type = #{invType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_caselevel = #{isCaselevel,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , created_id = #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , last_modify_time = now() , modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id} and last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime} and ou_id = #{ouId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_wh_carton where id = #{id} and ou_id=#{ouid}
